description.en: The brother of the Archduke of Jeuno and wielder of a mysterious power. A genius with excellent political judgement、 he is allowed to express his opinion in government matters. While he acts like an innocent child、 his appearance has not changed for over 30 years. Though proactively pursuing that which interests him、 he also possesses the ability to plan with composure.
description.jp:
不思議な力を持つ ジュノ大公の兄弟。
政治的判断に優れた天才児であり
政務に口を挟むことを許されている。
無邪気な少年のように振る舞うが
その姿は３０年以上変わっていない。
興味深いものには積極的に動く一方で
冷静な計画性も兼ね備えた人物。

jp.text: ジラート1万年の夢が\nついに現実になるんだよ
クリスタルのみもとへお帰り……
永遠とは何なのか\n知りたくないかい？
僕が 答えを与えてあげるよ
おまえ達はここで終わっちゃえ！

gl.text: The dream that I have seen for the past ten thousand years—the dream of Paradise.
Return to the crystal from which you were born.
Don't you、 too、 want to know what awaits in eternal paradise?
You will find those answers in Tu'Lia.
Now is time to say good night...
And ten thousand years I have waited.

desc.en: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 遠距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE ranged BRV + HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals total HP damage to each target
Tremendously restores HP
Does not consume ability use

Dispels [Exoplates] upon use and becomes [Stellar Burst]
　∟ 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV + HP attack
　∟ Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
　∟ Inflicts [S Speed Down] for 3 turns

While [Exoplates] is active:
• Lowers BRV damage taken
• Lowers HP damage taken
• Tremendously raises Debuff Evasion Rate
• Prevents KO and leaves HP value at 1
• When below 1% HP, tremendously restores HP and dispels [Exoplates]
desc.gl:
2-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals total HP damage to each target
Tremendously restores own HP
Does not consume ability use count
Cancels special effect Exoplates after use
Becomes Stellar Burst after special effect Exoplates canceled
While special effect Exoplates active:
 • Reduces BRV damage taken
 • Reduces HP damage taken
 • Tremendously reduces occurrence of debuffs
 • Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1
 • Tremendously restores own HP, cancels special effect Exoplates while HP less than 1% of MAX
desc.jp:
2HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは等倍
自身のHPを極大回復
使用回数を消費しない
使用後特殊効果「Exoplates」解除
特殊効果「Exoplates」解除後「ステラバースト」に変化
特殊効果「Exoplates」付与中 以下の効果が発動
・自身の受けるBRVダメージ軽減
・自身の受けるHPダメージ軽減
・自身の弱体回避率極大アップ
・敵の攻撃でHPダメージを受けても必ず1残る
・自身のHPが最大HPの1％未満の時
 自身のHPを極大回復し 特殊効果「Exoplates」解除

Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
Inflicts [Attack Down] to all enemies for 3 turns
Grants [Aged Wisdom] for 4 turns

When [Exoplates] is dispelled:
• Recovers all ability uses and becomes [Omega Javelin]
　∟ 3-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Casts [Warp] on all enemies for 1 turn
　∟ Inflicts [S Defense Down] on all enemies for 3 turns
　∟ Grants [Aged Wisdom] for 4 turns

※[Warp] grants an additional turn after any afflicted target's turn
※Granted turns do not increase turn count

[Aged Wisdom] raises Max BRV and Attack

[Warp] lowers Defense

 • Becomes Omega Javelin

desc.en:
When using 「Phase Shift」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4  
- Moderately raises total BRV potency 
- Slightly raises Max BRV Overflow limit of stolen BRV
- Nullifies Action Delay
- Does not increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

When using 「Stellar Burst」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 5  
- Moderately raises total BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Phase Shift:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV
 • Instant turn rate
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

When using Stellar Burst:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
desc.jp:
「フェイズシフト」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・行動負荷がない

　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分

name.jp: ウラノスカスケードエクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Uranos Cascade」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Slightly raises HP damage dealt to non-targets
- Extends duration of 「Aged Wisdom」 by 4 turns

When using 「Omega Javelin」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 5 
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
- Slightly raises HP damage dealt to non-targets
- Extends duration of 「Aged Wisdom」 by 4 turns

While 「Aged Wisdom」 is active:
- 「BRV Attack」 becomes 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
　∟ Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- 「HP Attack」 becomes 「HP Attack+」
　∟ 2-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Uranos Cascade:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slightly increased HP damage to non-targets
 • Mulled Cunning duration +4

When using Omega Javelin:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Slightly increased HP damage to non-targets
 • Mulled Cunning duration +4

While Mulled Cunning active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp:
「ウラノスカスケード」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外に与えるHPダメージ小アップ
・「巡らされた智謀」の4ACTION期間延長

「オメガジャベリン」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・ターゲット以外に与えるHPダメージ小アップ
・「巡らされた智謀」の4ACTION期間延長

「巡らされた智謀」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

- BRV attack hit count becomes 8
- Greatly raises total BRV potency 
- Slightly raises Max BRV Overflow limit of stolen BRV

When using 「Vortex+」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 8
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- Slightly raises Max BRV Overflow limit of stolen BRV

When using Vortex:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV

When using Vortex+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV

「ヴォーテクス＋」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が8HITに変化し
 合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
